physical_appearance:This is a set of four lace strips. They are of varying lengths and design. They feature a repeated scrolling pattern.

sgcool_label_text:There are 4 strips of lace of varying lengths and design. The making of bobbin lace was an established tradition in port cities like Malacca and Palembang by the early 20th century. It is part of a donation which contains a mixture of materials used in the making of kebayas and baju panjangs.
